Package ru.clevertec.comment.service

Class CommentServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
ru.clevertec.comment.service.CommentServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommentService
@Service public class CommentServiceImpl extends Object implements CommentService
Service implementation for managing comments on news entities. This class provides methods to retrieve, create, update, and archive comments.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sergey Leshkevich

      @Cacheable(value="api-cache", key="#id") public CommentResponse get(Long id)
      Retrieves a comment by its ID.
      Specified by:
      get in interface CommentService
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the comment to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A CommentResponse representing the retrieved comment.
      Throws:
      ru.clevertec.exceptionhandlerstarter.exception.EntityNotFoundException - if the comment is not found or is archived.

    • getCommentByNewsId

      public CommentResponse getCommentByNewsId(Long commentId, Long newsId)

      Parameters:

      newsId - The ID of the news associated with the comment.

      Throws:

    • search

      public List<CommentResponse> search(String searchValue, Integer offset, Integer limit)
      Searches for comments based on a search value with boosted fields without using Stream. Uses Hibernate Search to perform a search and maps the results to CommentResponse objects.
      Specified by:
      search in interface CommentService
      Parameters:
      searchValue - The value to search for in the "username" and "text" fields.
      offset - The offset for pagination.
      limit - The maximum number of results to fetch.
      Returns:
      A List of CommentResponse objects representing the search results.
